text:
May 25, 1956
Miss Anna Hyar
Associate Executive Secretary
Department of Audio-Visual Instruction
national Education Association
1210 Sixteenth Street, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Miss Hyeri
Pursuant to Dr. Skomia’s letter of May 16 to you I am
enclosing the last three program offerings of the NAEB Radio net¬
work.
As Dr. Skornia mentioned, it will be necessary for you
to negotiate with the originating stations except in the case of
grant-in-aid series for which the ETRC and NAEB hold all rights.
Also, you realize that we are not able to release programs from
foreign sources without their written permission.
I trust these offerings will be of assistance to you.
Sincerely,
Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager
REUtwc
Enclosures! Last three offerings
cci Dr. Skomia
